document_data.name: Southern Lluirwood
document_data.mainbody: The '''Southern Lluirwood''', or the '''Granuin Forest''', was a forest in [[Luiren]] and [[Dambrath]].
document_data.Geography: The Southern Lluirwood was located south of the [[Lluirwood]] and made up the eastern border of Luiren and the western border of [[Dambrath]].
document_data.Description: The Southern Lluirwood was mostly untamed, although the eastern border was patrolled by militia and halfling [[ranger]]s and [[druid]]s. A river ran from the center of the forest to the ocean.
document_data.Inhabitants: The forest was inhabited by monsters, including [[beholder]]s and [[yuan-ti]].
